entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
